title: New: Kid A – BB Bleu
body:
Virginia-born producer **[Kid A](http://kidaiskool.info/)**’s debut record **_[PPPONEY OST](http://ppponeyost.bandcamp.com/album/ppponey-ost)_** all but passed me by when it was released at the tail end of last summer. It sat reluctantly on my ‘must listen’ list, tempting but never completely convincing me to give it a full listen. Looking back I wish I had, because if this re-mastering of stand out track (apparently), ‘**_BB Bleu_**’ is anything to go by, then the album is sure to be quite a treat.

Stream the re-mastered cut below, stream the whole LP [here](http://ppponeyost.bandcamp.com/) and follow Kid A on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/KIDAISKOOL) to hear more of her impending release **_[BLCKRSECHLL](https://twitter.com/#!/ilovekida)_.**
